metadata.Title: SiriusQuality Soil Temperature
metadata.Extended description: Component that computes daily minimum and maximum soil surface temperatures from air temperatures, soil heat flux and a latent heat parameter, updates a deep-layer soil temperature via an exponential smoothing, and optionally derives hourly soil temperatures using the Parton & Logan (1981) diurnal curve. Key parameters: lambda_ (latent heat of vaporization), and hourly-shape parameters a, b, c. Inputs include min/max/mean air temperature, mean annual air temperature, day length, and soil heat flux; outputs include min/max soil temperature, hourly soil temperature profile, and deep-layer temperature.
metadata.Short description: Daily min/max and hourly soil temperature calculator with deep-layer update (Parton & Logan approach).
